title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 151-1.1 - Scope of Subpart
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 151-1.1 - Scope of Subpart

State Regulations

The purpose of this Subpart is to provide four-year-old
children with universal opportunity to access prekindergarten programs. This

Subpart sets forth procedures and requirements for implementing such programs
and making application to the Commissioner of Education. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
151-1.1

Amended

New

York State Register December 24, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 52, eff. 12/24/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
